code: import React from'react';import{Line}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import'./Prices.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);var Prices=function Prices(_ref){var todaysPrices=_ref.todaysPrices,tomorrowsPrices=_ref.tomorrowsPrices;var labels=Array.from({length:24},function(e,i){return i;});var todaysPriceArr=Array.from(todaysPrices,function(days){return days['total'];});var tomorrowsPriceArr=Array.from(tomorrowsPrices,function(days){return days['total'];});var data={labels:labels,datasets:[{label:'TodaysPrices',data:todaysPriceArr,borderColor:'rgb(255, 99, 132)',backgroundColor:'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.5)'},{label:'TomorrowsPrices',data:tomorrowsPriceArr,borderColor:'rgb(53, 162, 235)',backgroundColor:'rgba(53, 162, 235, 0.5)'}]};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"prices",children:data&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chartContainer",id:"join",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:data,options:{maintainAspectRatio:false}})})});};export default Prices;
